name: Rate 'n Tweet
author: Softerize

sections.description: Rate ‘n Tweet adds a links to Twitter with a automatic rating. You can change the appearence in the Settings > Rate ‘n Tweet menu.
sections.installation: Upload the Rate ‘n Tweet plugin to your blog, activate it, and change the settings as you wish.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Updated to Rate ‘n Tweet javascript version 0.9, which comes with the plugin now, in case our server run into problems
  • URL Shortener added – customize it in the settings menu
  • Limit the title size automatically, in order to keep the length smaller than 140 characters

1.0

  • This is the first release, if you have problems let us know (contact@ratentweet.com)

short_description: Rate 'n Tweet adds a rating system that forward the user to his Twitter page so the user can share it via Twitter.
description: Rate ‘n Tweet adds a links to Twitter with a automatic rating. You can change the appearence in the Settings > Rate ‘n Tweet menu.
